Package org.pdxfinder.graph.repositories

Interface OntologyTermRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OntologyTerm,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OntologyTerm,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OntologyTerm,​java.lang.Long>
    @Repository
public interface OntologyTermRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OntologyTerm,​java.lang.Long>
